Interstellar and Intra-Galactic Medium, Dust¶

Mily Way dust extinction map¶

Maps¶

  • SFD98 Dust Map

    • Schlegel, Finkbeiner & Davis (see 1998 reference below) derived an all-sky map of Galactic reddening, E(B-V), from a composite 100 micron map formed from IRAS/ISSA maps calibrated using DIRBE observations.

  • 3D Dust Mapping with Pan-STARRS 1, 2MASS and Gaia

    • These dust maps are based on Pan-STARRS 1 photometry of 800 million stars, 2MASS photometry of 200 million stars, and Gaia parallaxes of 500 million stars.

  • Green et al. 2016 - A Three-Dimensional Map of Milky-Way Dust

  • Green et al. 2019 - High-Galactic-latitude 2D dust map using Gaussian Processes

Tools¶

  • SFD - Schlegel, Finkbeiner, David dust maps in Python

  • dustmaps - A uniform interface for a number of 2D and 3D maps of interstellar dust reddening/extinction

    • By Gregory Green. Including multiple dust maps.

  • mwdust - Dust in 3D in the Milky Way

    • By Jo Bovy. Including multiple dust maps.

  • dust_extinction - Astronomical Dust Extinction

    • This package provides astronomical interstellar dust extinction curves implemented using the astropy.modeling framework.

Interstellar Dust Model¶

  • THEMIS - The Heterogeneous dust Evolution Model for Interstellar Solids

  • SHIVA - a numerical tool for evolution of dust in the ISM

    • SHIVA simulates the dust destruction in warm neutral, warm ionized, and hot ionized media under the influence of photo-processing, sputtering, and shattering. Based on this work

Extragalactic ISM and Dust Dataset¶

  • DustPedia: A Definitive Study of Cosmic Dust in the Local Universe

Taotie
